about_the_game:
A battle awaits in a yonder realm!
A fantasy Third-Person Shooter where girls wield swords, magic, and firearms against their foes!

"Bullet Girls Phantasia" is the latest installment of the all-female third person shooter "Bullet Girls" series.
This game is a thrilling action-packed game where cute girls shoot assault rifles and bazookas in a world filled with slimes, orcs, and dragons.

◆Cute knights, elves, mages, oh my!
Joining your eight favorites from the series are six new inhabitants of this alternate world.
The old and new will unite together to defeat an all-powerful enemy.

◆Uniforms, armor, and underwear are at the mercy of Clothing Damage!
Armor will be destroyed bit by bit as you take damage from an enemy.
As girls weather the enemy's onslaught, their bras and panties will start to take damage until there's nothing left!

◆Put characters under pressure with the all-new 360-degree Intensive Drilling!
The Intensive Drilling mode has totally evolved.
Characters can be viewed from any angle, and a new Gallery mode enables you to sit back and enjoy.

◆Reverse Drilling for those hankering for some sweet punishment!
Experience another side of the girls by reversing the roles in Reverse Drilling! Enjoy being teased with biting words and actions in this special mode.

highlighted.name: This is like one of my animes

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains partial nudity, sexual themes, harsh language, and content that may not be suitable for all ages. Although it does not contain any graphic sexual content, it does have a mode where characters can be touched and as such may not be appropriate for the workplace. 

*All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
Digital Deluxe Edition


Bullet Girls Phantasia Deluxe Edition includes the main game, along with all clothes, bra and panties, and support characters.

Deluxe Edition Set
1. "Bullet Girls Phantasia" Full Game
2. Costume Set: China Dresses (Red / Blue / Black)
3. Costume Set: Bunny Girl Suits (Black / White / Red)
4. Costume Set: Naughty Camos (Green / Brown / White)
5. Costume Set: Pirate Costumes (Blue / Red / Orange)
6. Costume Set: Midgardian Uniforms (Beige / Red / Blue)
7. Costume Set: Bikini Armors (Red / Blue / Gold)
8. Costume Set: Pale Wings (Blue / Peach / Purple / Rapier Thruster)
9. Underwear Set: Frilly (Peach / Yellow / Aqua / Lavender)
10. Underwear Set: Frilly Ribbon (Aqua / Peach / Black / Chartreuse)
11. Underwear Set: Silicone (Chartreuse / Brown / Black / Beige)
12. Underwear Set: Chest Binding & Loincloth (Navy Blue / Brown / Gold / White)
13. Underwear Set: Lace (Beige / Brown / Gold / Purple)
14. Underwear Set: Strawberry Print (White / Orange / Red / Purple)
15. Support Character: Yurina Kanezono
16. Support Character: Remi Kishino
17. Support Character: Tsukiyo Takanashi
18. Support Character: Saki Amamine
19. Support Character: Minagi Kamishiro
20. Support Character: Aki Saotome
21. Support Character: Mai Doiuchi
22. Support Character: Silvia Hortensie
23. Support Character: Sarria Violette
24. Support Character: Hardina Crescent
25. Support Character: Faren Sealwinde
26. Support Character: Merrina Iris
27. Support Character: Ladoria Sealwinde

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit / Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3225 3.30 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650：1GB / Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit / Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 3.40 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIAGeForce GTX 1060：3GB / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
